name: Special Blind
description: Draw cards to manifest their energy and influence the odds in your favor.

badges.text:
Drawing the same suit multiplies the suits' effects. Cards can be maxed out up to three.
§5Clubs§r: Speed§a↑§r
§7Spades§r: Damage§a↑§r
§cHearts§r: Regeneration§a↑§r
§bDiamonds§r: Armor§a↑§r

§6"INFLUENCE"§r

When drawing a card, §6INFLUENCE§r allows you to draw the same card again! (look at keybind badge on how to use)

When a card is maxed, you can draw a golden card. A golden card will grant you +1 of all card types but in return, you will lose 2 permanent hearts and reset §6INFLUENCE§r.

One lost heart is regained every 1m30s.

text:
" to draw a card with §6"INFLUENCE"§r!
 Press "
" instead to pick a random card (or a golden card)!
